

### Genetic Main Effect
```{r , echo=FALSE, out.width = '100%'}
knitr::include_graphics(paste0("/home/rak/Dropbox/FIGI/Results/", params$exposure, "/plots/qq_chiSqG_",        params$exposure, "_", params$covariates, ".png"))
knitr::include_graphics(paste0("/home/rak/Dropbox/FIGI/Results/", params$exposure, "/plots/manhattan_chiSqG_", params$exposure, "_", params$covariates, ".mh.png"))

x <- readRDS(paste0("/home/rak/Dropbox/FIGI/Results/", params$exposure, "/files/chiSqG_", params$exposure, "_", params$covariates, ".rds"))
datatable(x, options = list(pageLength = 10))
```
